mapper.select: SELECT tg.name AS mood_name, COUNT(*) AS vote_count FROM track_mood_vote t JOIN tag tg ON t.mood = tg.id WHERE t.track_id = #{trackId} GROUP BY tg.name ORDER BY vote_count DESC LIMIT 6
